member.name: M:atcGraph.clsGraphFrequency.IsIn(System.Double,System.Double[])
member.summary: Return True if aArray is Nothing or else it contains a number within 1e-30 of aNumber

member.name: M:atcGraph.modGraph.Scalit(System.Double,System.Double,System.Boolean,System.Double@,System.Double@)
member.summary: Determines an appropriate scale based on the minimum and maximum values and whether an arithmetic or logarithmic scale is requested. For log scales, the minimum and maximum must not be transformed.
